summary.subject: Call for Participation (Main Conference + Workshops): EASE'25: 29th International Conference on Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering, June 17-20, 2025

conference_details.name: EASE'25
conference_details.focus: Evaluation and Assessment in Software Engineering
conference_details.description: A forum for researchers and practitioners to present and discuss recent research results on empirical evaluation of software engineering technologies, practices, and tools.
